title: Can't queue for games, just constantly told I have to wait 20 minutes
body:
So the client kept crashing with this error telling me to contact riotgames support everytime I tried to queue a game. It gave me 20 minute game restrictions for apparently dodging queues I wasn't even in.

Now I'm just stuck in this loop where it says I have to wait 20 minutes before playing a game, then the timer counts down from 20:00 to zero, then as soon as the countdown is finished it pops up with a box saying I've been put in a low priority queue for 5 games, then the 20 minute count down starts again. I've been trying to queue for over 3 hours now. I've watched the 20 to 0 countdown 4 times in a row now but it keeps telling me I've got 5 games left of restrictions then just starts the 20 minutes again without ever letting me queue a game. 

I've submitted 3 support tickets but no reply.

Has anyone experienced this before or have any idea how I can fix it?
I've restarted the client, restarted my computer and restarted my router

replies.body:
http://uploads.im/5tcPx.jpg

Again waited another 20 minutes, the countdown has finished but it doesn't queue for games. If I click anything at all it pops up and tells me I've been placed in a low priority queue for ANOTHER 5 games and starts the 20 minute count down again.
